tweet:
Congressional internships allow students to see our Nation’s legislative process up close, and opportunities are opening up in both my D.C. and district offices.
If you're interested in joining #TeamHice this summer, apply before April 1st here ➡️ https://hice.house.gov/forms/internships/ …. pic.twitter.com/qCrcJjmsd6

Sign up for the next edition of my Service Academy newsletter→ https://hice.house.gov/forms/form/?ID=31 …. 

These quarterly messages provide updates from current cadets and midshipmen, offer useful tips for those applying to an academy, include words of wisdom from my Academy Board, & more. #GA10

I'm grateful to Ranking Member @Jim_Jordan for selecting me for this position, and I look forward to working alongside him and my other colleagues on this committee to root out waste, fraud, and abuse for the protection of our country and the good of the American people.

Honored to serve as @GOPoversight Ranking Member of the Subcommittee on National Security to support and strengthen the safety of the American people. My highest priorities are advancing America’s interests at home and abroad and putting politics aside in search of the truth.

I'm highlighting outstanding #GA10 citizens who work hard every day to brighten the lives of the people surrounding them & improve our community. Our first “Hice Headliner” is Ms. Cynthia Watkins, a substitute school teacher born and raised in Monroe, GA→ https://bit.ly/2DIWGVe . pic.twitter.com/3ffK7Xtirk

Having #TeamHice travel throughout #GA10 allows more time for those w/ concerns & questions to explore solutions with folks who are in a position to help. Tomorrow, my staff will set up shop at the Tennille Community Health Center to bring the services of my office closer to you. pic.twitter.com/789CkI4Zo8

I wrapped up last week back home in Georgia, where I spent time celebrating local businesses and economic growth with folks at local chambers of commerce in Oconee & Washington Co. It’s always great being with the good people of #GA10, & I look forward to seeing many of you soon. pic.twitter.com/pCN48wrwDK

Today, we pause to remember and honor the lives and contributions of the #Challenger crew, who paid the ultimate sacrifice while executing the mission of our Nation’s space program. May we never forget their service and sacrifice.  #OnThisDay https://twitter.com/cspan/status/1089843560298545153 …

Today, we commemorate #InternationalHolocaustRemembranceDay as we #NeverForget the millions who lost their lives during the Holocaust. #WeRemember those who suffered and those who survived, and we will fight to ensure that such hatred #NeverAgain takes hold. pic.twitter.com/JfDobz4bB6

.@SpeakerPelosi’s cancellation of the #SOTU is just the latest refusal by Democrats to hear solutions offered by @POTUS @realDonaldTrump to #SecureOurBorder & reopen the government. Closing the House's doors to our Commander-in-Chief is not a solution. Time to come to the table.

My office is here as a resource, and I make sure that #TeamHice is regularly available to assist constituents with problems or concerns at satellite office locations held throughout #GA10. I encourage folks who may have questions to visit with my staff at an upcoming event. pic.twitter.com/iVlm5mQWXR

Thank you to everyone who was able to jump on the line last Thursday for our first telephone town hall of the new Congress. I look forward to holding several more forums this year to hear directly from #GA10.

During the call, I asked two poll questions, and the results are in! pic.twitter.com/TriX3UmMNc

Honoring the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., whose message of love and equality continues to inspire millions of people. We remember him for his courage, his sacrifices, and his teachings. May we continue to strive for his dream of a better America. #MLKDay pic.twitter.com/AwjvY9XtL9

.@POTUS @realDonaldTrump has once again made a good faith offer that secures the border and opens the rest of government. Shame on Democrats for their continued unwillingness to even talk, putting political fights ahead of the critical need to strengthen border security.

Today, hundreds of thousands of Americans marched to end the horrific practice of abortion and protect innocent, unborn lives. Dee Dee and I were proud to join the #ProLife cause this morning and stand up for God’s greatest gift: life. #WhyWeMarch

Everyone has the right to practice their religion freely and openly. Our country was founded on this principle, and it's a cornerstone of our identity to this day. I feel blessed to live in a Nation dedicated to protecting this fundamental right. Happy #ReligiousFreedomDay. pic.twitter.com/vurTyzMrLk

Ensuring folks have the opportunity to share their thoughts, questions, and concerns directly with me is a key part of my job. As we begin not only a new year, but a new session of Congress, I’m looking forward to hearing how I can best represent the good people of #GA10 in DC. pic.twitter.com/01Cfp3afbw

Enough is enough. How many more families need to lose loved ones before we take action? How many more families will no longer hear the laugh of their child before we #SecureOurBorders? What is it going to take to #DoWhatWeSaid? 

It's time to face reality and #BuildTheWall. pic.twitter.com/PdZtazA1zH

We remain committed to ensuring the integrity of our borders and the safety and security of the American people. We're here fighting for the angel parents, families, and victims, who want a reasonable immigration system to protect our children and grandchildren. #BuildTheWall https://twitter.com/freedomcaucus/status/1085297938417496065 …

Grateful to join Georgians today as our state welcomed its new leader. A huge thank you to @GovernorDeal for your years of dedicated service. You stand as a Georgia fixture. To the new @GovKemp, congratulations, my friend! I look forward to many years of working together. #GA10 pic.twitter.com/6odoYh1A4F

While @POTUS @realDonaldTrump is in Washington at the negotiating table in pursuit of compromise to secure our borders, Congressional Democrats are soaking in sunshine during their “winter retreat” in Puerto Rico this weekend. #PuertoRicoPelosi https://twitter.com/DavidMcAlpine/status/1084156883714392067 …

Happy to have @GeorgeWalton Academy students in Washington, D.C. this week! Coming from Monroe through the @CloseUp_DC program, I was grateful to meet and speak with these active, young citizens about government and public service. Thanks for stopping by! #GA10 #HillDay pic.twitter.com/JWtAHVXODR

Zero dollars to #SecureTheBorder is not a compromise, but that’s what @SpeakerPelosi & @SenSchumer are offering. Let this sink in – they are choosing their political hatred of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump over the safety & security of the American people. #BuildTheWall #BorderSecurity pic.twitter.com/AmDHXRN8tP

Talking with @FoxBusiness @AftertheBell about border security and @POTUS @realDonaldTrump’s compelling case on the need to immediately to secure our southern border and #BuildTheWall. pic.twitter.com/c4ZzyY71qf

I am truly grateful for the sacrifices and dedication of our law enforcement officers as we recognize and remember all of the brave men and women who have put their lives on the line. God bless all our men and women in blue. #NationalLawEnforcementAppreciationDay pic.twitter.com/tzIlo9gO6T

Today, we celebrate the #ThinBlueLine of protection provided by our law enforcement officers, both in #GA10 and nationwide. On #NationalLawEnforcementAppreciationDay, please take a moment to thank the men and women who keep our communities safe and protect us each and every day. pic.twitter.com/Wn2d6wFtF0
Joining @TimBryantRadio to discuss the latest from Washington and get my reaction to the #TrumpAddress. Tune in here:  http://wgauradio.com .  #gapol #GA10 pic.twitter.com/zI5E5g4SXz

Reflecting back on the 115th Congress, I'm extremely proud of everything we have accomplished. Serving the folks of #GA10 & working tirelessly to connect with constituents, ensure folks get the best service possible, and represent their concerns will always be my top priority. pic.twitter.com/9qeONRlJdG

Our community lost a dedicated public servant yesterday with the passing of Dacula Mayor Jimmy Wilbanks. My deepest condolences to his family, loved ones, & friends. While he was well-known for his work in Gwinnett County, his absence will be felt across the state. Rest in peace. https://twitter.com/GwinnettDaily/status/1080909936391905280 …

I'm humbled to serve another term representing the good folks of #GA10, and I’m proud that my team has hosted successful Mobile Office Hours throughout each of the 25 counties in our district. This January, I invite you to take advantage of these events→ https://hice.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=2573 …. pic.twitter.com/laQ66yZpu4

After 231 years, #Georgia's still feelin' peachy! #OTD in 1788, our great State ratified the U.S. Constitution, becoming the fourth state in the union. May the next 231 be filled with freedom and prosperity! More fun facts curated by the @librarycongress→ http://cdn.loc.gov/project/lcnet/states/Georgia.html …
